Submedial nucleus.EditorialNote: Brain Info has this nucleus as part of the posterior nuclear group.  Based on the description in Paxinos, I thought it needed review.
Submedial nucleus.Definition: Thalamic nucleus separated from the ventromedial part of the mediodorsal nucleus of the thalamus by the internal medullary lamina (Paxinos The rat nervous system 2nd ed, Academic Press, 1995).
